testcase.brief: Verify that the function of dhcp-server ip-pool.
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Set vlan to interface mgt0.1 Set ip address to interface mgt0.1 Enable dhcp-server of interface mgt0.1 Create a SSID and bind it to interface wifi0 Create a user-profile and set the same vlan with mgt0.1 Set the same attribute to SSID with user-profile
Test Procedure: 1. Verify that can set ip-pool correctly for interface mgt0.x and the interface mgt0.x net address must be in the range. 2. Verify that can change the first ip address and the last ip address. 3. Verify that can remove the ip-pool. 4. Verify that can set 8 ip-pools for one mgt0.x 5. Verify that ip-pool can not overlap for different interface. 6. Verify that can not set ip-pool when mgt0.x address is not set. 7. Verify that can remove the mgt0.x even ip-pool is set. 8. Verify that there is not error happen when ip-pool is not set and dhcp-server is enabled. 9. Set ip-pool, use a laptop connect to SSID, check if client can obtain ip address, check ip range

step.desc: Set mgt0.1 vlan and ip
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${vlan_id}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${dhcp_start}/${mask_addr}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: set ip-pool correctly for interface mgt0.1
Verify that can set ip-pool correctly for interface mgt0.x
change the first ip address
Verify that can change the first ip address
change the last ip address
Verify that can change the first ip address
remove the ip-pool.
Verify that can remove the ip-pool.
disable interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server
set 8 ip-pools for one mgt0.1
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_1} ${dhcp_end_1}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_2} ${dhcp_end_2}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_3} ${dhcp_end_3}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_4} ${dhcp_end_4}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_5} ${dhcp_end_5}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_6} ${dhcp_end_6}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_7} ${dhcp_end_7}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_8} ${dhcp_end_8}"

step.desc: check the ip-pool config
set 9 ip-pools for one mgt0.1 error
step.log-match: -c -e "ERROR: The number of IP pools up to maximum 8"

step.desc: Verify that ip-pool can not overlap for different interface.
Clear mgt0.1 ip-pool and ip
step.telnet: -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_1} ${dhcp_end_1}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_2} ${dhcp_end_2}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_3} ${dhcp_end_3}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_4} ${dhcp_end_4}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_5} ${dhcp_end_5}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_6} ${dhcp_end_6}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_7} ${dhcp_end_7}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start_8} ${dhcp_end_8}" -v "no interface mgt0.1 ip"

step.desc: Verify that can not set ip-pool when mgt0.x address is not set.
step.log-match: -c -e "Error: get IP address of mgt0.1 failed"

step.desc: set mgt0.x address and ip-pool.
remove the mgt0.x even ip-pool is set.
Verify that can remove the mgt0.x even ip-pool is set.
8. Verify that there is not error happen when ip-pool is not set and dhcp-server is enabled.
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${dhcp_start}/${mask_addr}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "show logging buffered level error"

step.desc: add new vlan
step.telnet: -v "enable" -v "config" -v "vlan database" -v "vlan ${vlan_id}" -v "end" -v "config" -v "interface ethernet g${ap1.eth0.swport}" -v "switchport trunk allowed vlan add ${vlan_id}"

step.desc: Set vlan to interface mgt0.1 Set ip address to interface mgt0.1 Enable dhcp-server of interface mgt0.1 Create a SSID and bind it to interface wifi0 Create a user-profile and set the same vlan with mgt0.1 Set the same attribute to SSID with user-profile Set ip-pool, use a laptop connect to SSID
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${vlan_id}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${dhcp_start}/${mask_addr}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start} ${dhcp_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "user-profile ${ssid.name} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${vlan_id} attribute 1" -v "interface ${ssid_bind_interface} ssid ${ssid.name}"
